title: Did the ancient Egyptians write from right to left? - Quora

response.answer_text: The heiroglyphics had various scripts like heratic, demotic and so on. The earlier heiroglyphics were written and read from top to bottom, left to right and even right to left. But demotic was written from right to left.
Yes the the Ancient Hebrew, ancient Egyptians, Aramaic, all of the scripts were written from Right to left side..
